```{r}
library(clp)

# From Physician's Health Study, on whether regular
# intake of aspirin reduces the rate of heart disease.
# 
# Data:
# 
#         | Yes |   No  | Total
# -----------------------------
# Placebo | 189 | 10845 | 11034
# Aspirin | 104 | 10933 | 11037

x <- c(189, 104)
n <- c(11034, 11037)
```

# Difference in Proportions

```{r}
conf.score <- prop.conf(x, n)
conf.ac <- prop.conf.agresti.caffo(x, n)

conf.score$qconf(c(0.025, 0.975))
conf.ac$qconf(c(0.025, 0.975))
```

# Relative Risks

```{r}
conf.score <- risk.conf(x, n)
conf.score$qconf(c(0.025, 0.975))

conf.score <- risk.conf(x, n, log = 'x')
```
